topic.title: Someone is a gay man here? [¿Alguien por aquí es gay?]
topic.body:
Hi, i wanna know who is gay in this platform for interact and a exchange of interest.

-----Español: Hola, quiero saber quién es gay en esta plataforma para poder interactuar y tener intetercambios de intereses.

Saludos!

1_1JKjdEGjhxQxn7jAUM9kcHAqDEFF5TpxGQ.body:
I'm gay and I like sex with men. I look very respectable all other sexual orientations like pzmw. Surely follow your blog because it is very interesting. I've created my own blog and I'll try to fill it with content.

As for the "exchange of porn", it was not my intention because there are many sites where you can see that kind of content. Although in my blog, sometimes I could put a link and other because it is to my liking or exemplifying some of the issues that develop in it.

This is the link: http://127.0.0.1:43110/19wSXueGgiYZe5GRpiTZQeUeucsiUHu37z/

> [up4](#comment_6_1BLPKyrF2D4ertte6JnAa6oWAMYzZGwKQz): I couldn't reach it just now because it says it couldn't find enough peers. Make sure you stay connected for a while after you create or update a zeronet site.

Thanks!
